title: DeepProv: Behavioral Characterization and Repair of Neural Networks via Inference Provenance Graph Analysis
summary:
Deep neural networks (DNNs) are increasingly being deployed in high-stakes applications, from self-driving cars to biometric authentication. However, their unpredictable and unreliable behaviors in real-world settings require new approaches to characterize and ensure their reliability.
